text: The Ivondro River is a river located in central Madagascar. It drains to the eastern coast, into the Indian Ocean. The river is about long and its drainage basin extends to about . It flows through the town of Didy. The Volobe hydro- electric scheme was created in 1931 on the Ivondro River to provide power for Toamasina. == References == Category:Rivers of Madagascar
title: Ivondro River
